import React from "react"; import styles from "./Product.module.css" import basket from "../../Assets/img/basket.svg" import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const Product = (props) =>{ const AddSmart=()=>{ props.addSmart(props.name,props.photo,props.price) } return
{props.name}
{props.price}$
} export default Product;
